reviewText: This is a waste of money - none of the films are in the correct aspect ratio, so unless you preferred chopped-down VHS versions of movies to the way you saw them at the theater, why bother?  There's a reason you get four movies so cheaply - you're only seeing part of the films!
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kevin Costner (Executive Decision, Unlawful Entry, Soldier, Tequila Sunrise)

reviewText: It was a great deal.  I like Kevin Costner and this was a way to own four that he made
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kevin Costner (Executive Decision, Unlawful Entry, Soldier, Tequila Sunrise)

reviewText: These are very good on the shelf movies to have on hand when the cable goes down or you get tired of seeing the commercial ads.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kevin Costner (Executive Decision, Unlawful Entry, Soldier, Tequila Sunrise)

reviewText: This is the best Kevin Costner film collection available on DVD or Blu-ray to date. It includes Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves, Wyatt Earp, The Postman and JFK. The 4 Film Favorites is ideal for Costner fans on a budget. There are some light extras provided (trailers, interviews, etc.). These are 4 star films in a 3 star package because this works as a value pack only. These films are also available in deluxe stand-alone Blu-ray releases (sold separately).Robin Hood is my favorite version of the legend on film.Wyatt Earp is a western epic with some great performances.The Postman is a futuristic adventure about a postman who inspires hope to the small group of Americans left alive.JFK looks at the Kennedy assassination.
summary: 4 Kevin Costner Films in DVD Set
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kevin Costner (Executive Decision, Unlawful Entry, Soldier, Tequila Sunrise)

reviewText: Four movies of Kevin Costner on separate disks. That is 12 hours of primo entertainment. It comes in a Nice package for DVDs.All my favorites for one price. Great bargain.and fast delivery.  I really enjoyed the movies for quality and good entertainment.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kevin Costner (Executive Decision, Unlawful Entry, Soldier, Tequila Sunrise)

reviewText: These 4 movies are very entertaining.  Getting them as a set for such a good price is a great find.
summary: Four Kevin Kostner movies for a great price.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Kevin Costner (Executive Decision, Unlawful Entry, Soldier, Tequila Sunrise)
